=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ocean's Eleven (2001), Twelve & Thirteen Collection (3FE) (DVD) (Franchise Art)
Review Date: 2015/10/09
Store: Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Eleven. Twelve. Thirteen... Jackpot! Danny Ocean (George Clooney) and his elite crew of tricksters and thieves are back to back to back in these sleek, stylish thrillers directed by Steven Soderbergh. Ocean’s Eleven (Disc 1) kicks off the fun with a daring Las Vegas heist. The team doubles down and goes global to European glamour spots in Ocean’s Twelve (Disc 2/Side A). And Ocean’s Thirteen (Disc 2/Side B) has the group reuniting in Vegas for a dazzling scheme of payback against a double-crossing casino kingpin. Enough starpower to light up the Vegas Strip night joins Clooney. Are you in or out?']
Average Rating: 4.7

Skin Trade [Blu-ray]
Dolph Lundgren  (Actor),     Tony Jaa  (Actor),     Ekachai Uekrongtham  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['New Jersey cop Nick (Lundgren) heads to Thailand to track down Russian human-trafficking thugs who killed his family after he busts them in New York. Once in Thailand, he teams up with local cop, Tony (Jaa) as their road to retribution leads through high-speed chases and multiple confrontations uncovering corruption, pay-offs and personal vendettas.']

- **Rating Tendencies:** The user continues to consistently rate offerings highly, recently showcasing satisfaction with a five-star review. Their average rating has increased to 4.5, reflecting a discerning yet predominantly positive feedback approach.

- **Content Appreciation:** The user's enjoyment of audio-visual content remains strong, especially in action and adventure genres. Their recent purchase highlights a preference for dynamic narratives that keep them engaged.

- **Interest in Artists:** They favor notable contemporary figures in their media selections, indicating a sustained preference for recognizable talent that enhances the viewing experience.

- **Production Quality:** The user shows a clear inclination toward high-quality productions from established studios. Their latest engagement aligns with this trend, as they opted for a well-produced franchise collection that further demonstrates their taste for polished content.

- **Emphasis on Accessibility:** Accessibility continues to be a key factor for the user, consistently seeking out media that includes subtitles or closed captions. Their latest acquisition featured English subtitles, allowing for full engagement and reinforcing their commitment to inclusive viewing experiences.

Overall, the user’s sophisticated taste in media consistently reflects contemporary trends, prioritizing enjoyable, high-quality, and inclusive experiences in their viewing habits.
